name: Consent Collection
description: Collect and record consent from data principals

name: Breach Notification
description: Notify authority and data principals of breaches

name: Data Erasure
description: Process and execute data erasure requests

name: Data Correction
description: Process and execute data correction requests

name: Data Transfer
description: Transfer personal data to third parties with consent

name: Compliance Training
description: Deliver data protection training to staff
